title: Energetics of life
creator_credit: Mallory Pearce, Daniel E. Atkinson, E.A. Carlson and FilmFair Communications
brief_description: Treats the types and functions of energy in living things - kinetic and potential energy; thermodynamics; free energy and chemical energy. Described in detail are the structure and function of the ATP molecule; photosynthesis; the metabolism of glucose. Emphasizes the ability of the ATP molecule to harness solar energy and use it
